text: John Francis "Jack" Welch Jr. (November 19, 1935 - March 1, 2020) was an American retired business executive, author, and chemical engineer. He was chairman and CEO of General Electric between 1981 and 2001. In 2006, Welch's net worth was estimated at $720 million. When he retired from GE he received a severance payment of $417 million, the largest such payment in history. Welch died on March 1, 2020 of renal failure at his home in Manhattan at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Engineers from Massachusetts Category:American chief executives Category:Scientists from Boston Category:Businesspeople from Boston Category:Writers from Boston Category:People from Salem, Massachusetts Category:American chemical engineers
title: Jack Welch
